overview: Upon discovering she has herpes, twenty-something overachiever Saffie reaches out to Bek; the one night stand who ghosted her and the only person sheâ€™s ever slept with. When Bek insists on helping Saffie as she recovers from her initial outbreak, the two, bound together by their shared virus, come to better understand herpes, sexuality, and... each other.
title: Me & Her(pes)
